text: Cortinarius melleicarneus is a species of fungus in the large mushroom genus Cortinarius (subgenus Phlegmacium). Found in Estonia and Norway, where it grows on the ground in association with thermophilous deciduous trees, it was described as new to science in 2014. The specific epithet melleicarneus refers to the honey colored cap. ==See also== *List of Cortinarius species ==References== ==External links== * melleicarneus Category:Fungi described in 2014 Category:Fungi of Europe
title: Cortinarius melleicarneus
